Author: babayan93
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Asset Allocation Token | AI-based Portfolio Management Platform
Body: Thread Chief Moderator: TonyMark Thread Assistant Moderator: babyan93  Whitepaper              Website              Medium              Telegram              Facebook              Twitter  PRE-ICO START DATE: July 1, 2018 PRE-ICO END DATE:  July 30, 2018  ICO START DATE: August 5, 2018 ICO END DATE:  75 DAYS FROM ICO START DATE  The Vision:  To redefine existing practices of cryptocurrency portfolio management through a holistic, blockchain-based, artificial intelligence induced platform.  The Platform:  Asset Allocation Token, a software for mobile devices (Android & iOS) is little more than the usual run of the mill investment portfolio management platform. It’s lucid and intuitive interface leverages professional tools and expertise to provide users a smart solution for their ICO and cryptocurrency investments requirements. Assets are managed and allocated dexterously to deliver high-class adjusted returns.  An inbuilt risk-mitigation tool within the application provides:  Full Account Backup: Users can now backup their entire account portfolio into an encrypted file for safe keeping Charts & Graphs: Users can enhance their portfolio management experience by using AAT application’s integrated charts and graphs Comparison between buying value and current value: Users can access difference in value against the value for which they purchased the asset Timely Reports: Users can receive client reports for staying informed of their investment progress Trading Signals and Tips: Users can access AI-based trading signals, and tips for the portfolio by community-recommended managers Profit Calculation in Real-time: Users can calculate real-time profits of their portfolio Addition of ICO Token Profiles and New Coins: A customizable feature enabling users to add ICO and other tokens of their choice into their portfolio Latest News Feeds: A real-time news feeder sending notifications for the selected cryptocurrencies   The Token  The Asset Allocation Token ecosystem constitutes a cryptocurrency token, AAT. During the upcoming token generation event, the AAT Token will be implemented as an ERC-20 compatible utility token over the public Ethereum blockchain.  AAT will be available for availing different services in the Asset Allocation Token Network.  Activities in the Asset Allocation Token ecosystem will be performed exclusively using the AAT token, making it an integral part of “AAT system of economy”.  Token Supply & TGE:  TOTAL TOKEN SUPPLY (100%)                   45,000,000 AAT  TOTEL TOKEN SUPPLY FOR TGE (60%)       27,000,000 AAT  CLOSE GROUP TGE (50% BONUS)               4,000,000 AAT  PRE-SALE TGE (20% BONUS)                      6,000,000 AAT  MAIN TGE (NO BONUS)                             17,000,000 AAT  PROMOTER’s QUOTA                                  18,000,000 AAT  EXCHANGE RATE WITHOUT BONUS           1 AAT = 0.90 USD  AVAILABLE FOR                                       BTC, ETH, LTC, DASH and BCH  MINIMUM INVESTMENT AMOUNT              100 USD  SOFT CAP                                               $5,000,000  HARD CAP                                              $27,000,000

Author: babayan93
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Asset Allocation Token | AI-based Portfolio Management Platform
Body: Hi! As a part of its community building initiative, the platform has announced a bounty program. The program invites participants to spread the word about AAT and contribute towards the community building efforts. In return, they will receive rewards in the form of AAT tokens and more.  The company has set aside a small fortune (close to $135,000) as bounty offering. More information about the bounty program will be made available in the coming posts. Also, visit AAT website to participate in the token sale, and follow the social media channels to get the latest updates.

Author: Jorandck
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Asset Allocation Token | AI-based Portfolio Management Platform
Body: I see lots of platforms like AAT for investment management and cryptocurrency. what distinguishes it from other platforms and benefits to users?

Author: babayan93
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Asset Allocation Token | AI-based Portfolio Management Platform
Body: Hey Jorand. You are absolutely right. There are many platforms out there that have influenced the making of AAT. But we're trying to bring new modules to the table. They include: the ability to create smart contracts with Portfolio managers within the ecosystem and improve accountability, and a Social Sentiment tool that analyses the social media trends of thousands of tokens to indicate their future performances. I recommend you join our Telegram channel to directly interact with our developers. Here is the link: https://t.me/aatnetworks
